Summary: White Green ball falling from sky
divs: sighting detailsmy co worker and i just got into our carpool and were getting on highway 15 from the on ramp exit 118 and i looked to my left and saw this big green and white fireball falling down. it disinegrated quickly but it only looked like it was maybe 50 -100 feet above ground level. i've seen falling stars and red\orange meteors but nothing a vibrant green! maybe someone was shooting off fireworks...but at 5am on a monday morning? unlikely, but you never know. i saw another report of this happening in fl so i felt i should jot it down.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Idaho Falls
There were no other sightings in Idaho Falls on or around April 19th 2010
